article.title: Northrop to Support Battle Command Training Program
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Technical Services Incorporated, Herndon, Virginia, was awarded an approximate $75 million cost-plus-award-fee contract for the technical services to support mission requirements of the Battle Command Training Program at Fort Leavenworth, Kansas. The U.S. Army Mission and Installation Contracting Command, Fort Eustis, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
